properties.name: Nishapur Turquoise deposit, Ali-mersai mountain, Nishapur (Nishabur; Neyshabur), Nishapur County, Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Nishapur Turquoise deposit, Ali-mersai mountain, Nishapur (Nishabur; Neyshabur), Nishapur County, Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Turquoise in weathered trachyte. Numerous mines in the area. Arguably the world's finest specimens of turquoise have come from this deposit. The occurrences were already mined by the ancient Persians from at least 5,000 years BC. The Ali-mersai M...
